S_Raye_Scissors.Name: Maneuver - Scissors Cross!
S_Raye_Scissors.Description:
If this skill would go to Discard when played, it is sent there before triggering the following effect.
Link into a Striker form. This Link ignores the restrictions of Modules (but still may apply restrictions, if applicable)
If the user has Armory Armed!: activate the Link effect again.
(Cannot select Maneuver - Scissors Cross for Link effects triggered by this card)
